title: AI and Social Media Specialist with GHL experience Health
job_overview:
Total Impact Hub – USA-Based Coaching & Wellness Brand
Focus: 10X Health – A revolutionary wellness platform using precision genetic testing, custom supplements, and cellular optimization to help people reclaim their energy and performance.

We are looking for a creative, tech-savvy Social Media & SEO Specialist to help build, manage, and scale our 10X Health affiliate and lead generation campaigns. This role combines content creation, affiliate marketing, and GoHighLevel funnel work into one powerful remote position.
You will repurpose content by adding my affiliate link to all content before redirection to 10X Health
???? Repurpose existing 10X Health content (videos, articles, reels) into high-performing social posts
???? Create and post engaging reels, carousels, and captions on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube Shorts
?? Use hooks, CTAs, and educational captions that simplify health topics (genetics, supplements, energy, etc.)
???? Build and schedule GHL campaigns for affiliate recruitment and wellness lead gen
???? Create a social-media-supported SEO campaign to drive affiliate interest
???? Distribute posts and email content targeted at chiropractors, holistic health coaches, athletes, and health-focused network marketers
???? Help educate the audience on the science and benefit of personalized wellness using prewritten materials
???? Collaborate with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers to test and optimize content across multiple channels

???? Ideal If You:
Have 2+ years of experience with social media strategy and content development
Have used GoHighLevel to build workflows, opt-ins, emails, and funnels
Understand how to promote affiliate programs and grow ambassador interest
Can take one piece of content and turn it into 10+ unique assets across channels
Know how to speak to wellness-conscious audiences: busy moms, athletes, health coaches, and biohackers
Are organized, consistent, and creative with short-form content
Understand SEO principles, hashtags, and keyword optimization for affiliate growth

???? Tech Requirements:
Reliable high-speed internet (20 Mbps+ — screenshot required)
Laptop/PC with strong processing power for editing

Mastery with:
GoHighLevel
Canva
CapCut
Meta Business Suite, LinkedIn, YouTube Studio, TikTok
